mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.pid, p.name, p.type, p.path, p.component, p.permission_value, p.icon, p.sort, p.status, p.gmt_create, p.gmt_modified FROM user_role ur INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{id} AND p.status = 1 AND rp.deleted = 0 AND ur.deleted = 0 AND p.deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort
